translation.en: I need to talk with the Israeli Prime Minister.
translation.es: Necesito hablar con el primer ministro israelí.

translation.en: - Did we hear from the frog? - Yes.
Thank you for coming this late.
translation.es: Gracias por venir a esta hora.

translation.en: This is George Seif, Radio Damascus.
translation.es: Soy George Seif, de Radio Damasco.

translation.en: A few minutes ago, our beloved president,
translation.es: Nuestro estimado presidente, Amin al Hafez,

translation.en: Amin Al- Hafez, asked me to read this announcement.
translation.es: Nuestro estimado presidente, Amin al Hafez, me pidió que leyera este anuncio.

translation.en: you do not remember your name?
You do not know who you are.
I love you more than anything in the whole world.
translation.es: te amo más que a nada en todo el mundo.

translation.en: But if you come home late tonight, I will kill you. Nadia.
translation.es: Pero si llegas tarde esta noche, te mato. Nadia.

translation.en: That is none of your business.
Nothing is too expensive for you, mon amour.
translation.es: Nada es demasiado caro para ti, mon amour.

translation.en: Now hurry up if you don't want to be late.
It was so cheap. It was half...
...battle heavily damages Tiberias on the Israeli- Syrian border.

translation.es: El primer ministro inspecciona las ruinas.

translation.en: lies in an area claimed by both nations.
translation.es: está en una zona reclamada por las dos naciones.

translation.en: The fighting erupted quickly when Syrians allegedly fired
translation.es: Se cree que los sirios les dispararon
a granjeros israelíes que operaban tractores.

translation.en: Israel used tanks, mortars and aircraft
translation.es: Israel usó tanques, morteros y aviones

translation.en: - We don't have to go. - Syrian officials claim 70 Israelis killed
- on the ground... - It's fine. ...and five warplanes shot down.
translation.es: - No, está bien. - ...y habrían derribado cinco aviones.
Israel afirma haber derribado seis MiG sirios.

translation.en: reportedly showing the dogfight in the sky...
And the kids. I mean the kids.
Did they say how many casualties?
- Hi. - I've been looking for you all night.
translation.es: - Hola. - Te busqué toda la noche.

translation.en: I'm here with Nadia. You remember her?
You know my wife is absolutely infatuated with you, right?
translation.es: ¿Sabías que mi esposa está totalmente loca por ti?

translation.en: - Thank you so much. - I mean, come on.
Could you get us a tonic water with a lemon twist, please?
translation.es: ¿Nos traes agua tónica con un toque de limón?

translation.en: - No... - No, no, no, it's fine.
- It's fine. - No, I'm absolutely horrified.
- Ugh! - Please, please, don't worry. Um...
- It's because of the waistcoat. Uh... - No.
I'm fine, and to prove it,
I'm going to get us all a round of tonic water.
translation.es: iré a buscar agua tónica para todos.

translation.en: - No, no, no. - I'll come with you.
I care so much about the kids.
They were nice to invite us.
Well, they invited us to add color to their party, Nadia. That's it.
translation.es: Nos invitaron para darle color a su fiesta, Nadia, nada más.

translation.en: That's not true. She invited us because she likes me.
translation.es: No fue eso. Nos invitó porque le caigo bien.

translation.en: She's your friend? You fix her dresses.
You're her employee. That's all. You're her maid.
translation.es: Eres su empleada, nada más. Su mucama.

translation.en: I didn't mean she's not your friend or she doesn't like you.
translation.es: No digo que no sea tu amiga o que no le caigas bien.

translation.en: - You think that because they have money-- - No, no.
translation.es: Crees que por ser ricos no...

translation.en: It's because they think they're better than us.
With their stupid parties and their childish music.
translation.es: Con sus fiestas estúpidas y su música infantil.

translation.en: They have no idea what I did in Egypt.
translation.es: No imaginan lo que hice en Egipto.

translation.en: They think I'm just another immigrant.
translation.es: Creen que soy un inmigrante más.

translation.en: How would they know if you don't tell them?
translation.es: ¿Cómo lo sabrán si no les dices?

translation.en: You sit quietly in the corner and expect everyone to guess.
translation.es: Te quedas callado en un rincón y esperas que lo adivinen.

translation.en: You know what they see when they look at me?

translation.es: Yo sé lo que veo yo.

translation.en: Can you do me a favor?
Can you get me some tonic water with a lemon twist?
translation.es: ¿Me traes agua tónica con un toque de limón?

translation.en: I'm sick and tired of burying my sons and daughters...
translation.es: Estoy harto de enterrar a mis hijos e hijas...

translation.en: - There has to be a solution... - I quit.
...and I want to know what it is.
And if you can't give me the right answers,
translation.es: Si no puedes darme las respuestas,

translation.en: I'll fetch someone who'll give them to me.
translation.es: me buscaré a alguien que pueda.

translation.en: Jacob, this can't continue like this.
translation.es: Jacob, esto no puede seguir así.

translation.en: We need to send someone there as soon as possible.
translation.es: Hay que enviar a alguien cuanto antes.

translation.en: - It doesn't work that way. - Then make it work that way.
translation.es: - No funciona así. - Encárgate de que sí.

translation.en: We have no one in there to tell us what's going on. We're completely blind and deaf.
translation.es: No tenemos a nadie allá que nos informe. Estamos ciegos y sordos.

translation.en: I understand, but what you're talking about takes time.
translation.es: Ya sé, pero estas cosas llevan tiempo.

translation.en: How long? Syria's not like Egypt.
To build a reliable cover, train...
translation.es: Entre la pantalla y el entrenamiento...

translation.en: Uh... We're talking at least two years.
You have six months, not a day more.
You wanna go in there and tell him that right now?
I'll walk with you. Come on.
Let me know the moment you identify an asset.
We've made this mistake once before.
Come with me. I want to show you something.
I'm not supposed to show it to you.
In the past five months, there were four attacks from the Syrian Golan on our villages.
translation.es: En estos cinco meses, nos atacaron cuatro veces desde el Golán sirio.

translation.en: - The attacks are escalating. - I know all this.
translation.es: - Cada vez atacan más. - Ya lo sé.

translation.en: These aerial images we got from our American friends
translation.es: Estas imágenes, cortesía de nuestros amigos de EE. UU.,

translation.en: from where the Syrians are shooting.
these were taken one hour before...
translation.es: Estas fotos son de una hora antes

translation.en: and after the most recent attack.
translation.es: y una después del último ataque.

translation.en: We think underground, but we're not sure.
The Syrians are trying to make us look the other way.
Why? What are they up to?
We have no idea what they're building,
but I can assure you we're not going to like it.
translation.es: pero te aseguro que no nos va a gustar.

translation.en: The Golan is one of the most guarded places in the world.
translation.es: El Golán es uno de los lugares más custodiados del mundo.

translation.en: The Syrians don't let anyone in there.
translation.es: Los sirios no dejan entrar a nadie.

translation.en: We need eyes and ears on the other side of the border.
translation.es: Necesitamos a alguien al otro lado de la frontera.

translation.en: We owe our people the right to live in peace and security.
translation.es: Le debemos al pueblo el derecho a vivir en paz y con seguridad.

translation.en: In this land, that right doesn't come without a price.
translation.es: En esta tierra, ese derecho tiene precio.

translation.en: And sometimes the price is high, as you very well know.
translation.es: Y a veces el precio es alto, como bien sabes.

translation.en: Look, at least before you say no to me,
translation.es: Al menos, antes de decirme que no,

translation.en: consider all the people we are responsible for.
translation.es: piensa en cuánta gente depende de nosotros.

translation.en: immigrated to Israel three years ago.
translation.es: emigró a Israel hace tres años.

translation.en: - And we disqualified him because... - We don't like volunteers. Too eager.
translation.es: - Lo rechazamos porque... - Huímos de los voluntarios. Demasiado predispuesto. Y también por su hermano,

translation.en: And also because of his brother,
translation.es: Demasiado predispuesto. Y también por su hermano,
Maurice Cohen, analista de la oficina de Egipto.

translation.en: Oh, he smuggled Jews from Egypt to Israel.
translation.es: Trajo a escondidas a judíos de Egipto a Israel.

translation.en: - That's good. - Yeah, including his whole family.
translation.es: - Eso es bueno. - Sí, y a toda su familia.

translation.en: He joined them only years after. He stayed to help.
translation.es: Vino recién años después. Se quedó a ayudar.

translation.en: arrested in connection with the Lavon Affair.
translation.es: Lo arrestaron por el asunto Lavon.

translation.en: So he's got a record in Egypt.
Do you want me to send everyone home?
translation.es: ¿Les digo a todos que se vayan?

translation.en: I thought we stopped doing that.
translation.es: Creí que ya no hacíamos eso.

translation.en: Desperate times call for desperate measures.
I'm sorry I'm calling this late,
but I tried a few times.
- This is-- - I know who this is.

translation.es: No me llame más, por favor.

translation.en: Explain the significance of this again.
I can teach anyone to transmit,
to make a bomb, to go undercover.
translation.es: a armar una bomba, a operar encubierto.

translation.en: But a true agent has instinct,
translation.es: Pero un buen agente tiene instinto,

translation.en: He either has it or he doesn't.
translation.es: O lo tiene o no lo tiene.

translation.en: So you gave him the wrong address.
translation.es: Así que le diste mal la dirección.

translation.en: An operative should sense that something is wrong, and that he's being watched.
translation.es: El agente debe percibir que algo anda mal y que lo están vigilando.

translation.en: But there must be dozens of other windows facing him.
translation.es: Pero debe tener decenas de ventanas delante.

translation.en: And even if he knows this is a test, how could he possibly know that...
translation.es: Y aunque sepa que esto es una prueba, ¿cómo podría saber que...?

translation.en: Do you know who we are?
If I'm right, I applied to you twice before.
translation.es: Si no me equivoco, solicité entrar dos veces.

translation.en: We want to offer you the opportunity to do something important with your life.
translation.es: Queremos darte la oportunidad de hacer algo importante con tu vida.

translation.en: Do you consider yourself a patriot?
I love this country with all my might.
translation.es: Amo este país con el corazón.

translation.en: If your country needed you to quit your job, would you do it?
translation.es: Si tu país necesitara que renuncies a tu trabajo, ¿lo harías?

translation.en: If your country needed you to quit your job, would you do it?
translation.es: Si tu país necesitara que renuncies a tu trabajo, ¿lo harías?

translation.en: If your country needed you to lie to your friends, your family,
translation.es: Si necesitara que les mintieras a tus amigos, a tu familia,

translation.en: If your country asked you to risk your life,
translation.es: Si tu país te pidiera que arriesgues tu vida,

translation.en: Nothing about this conversation is hypothetical.
translation.es: Nada de esta conversación es hipotético.

translation.en: Tomorrow morning, you will get up,
translation.es: Mañana a la mañana, te levantarás,

translation.en: and come here without telling anyone.
translation.es: y vendrás aquí sin decírselo a nadie.

translation.en: You'll begin working with me and my team.
translation.es: Vas a trabajar conmigo y con mi equipo.

translation.en: In the next few days, you'll go through a series of tests,
translation.es: En los próximos días, pasarás por varias pruebas,

translation.en: you'll go through a period of training.
If, after that, you're found to be a good fit for us,
translation.es: Si nos pareces útil para el equipo,

translation.en: I'd like to kill this machine. Before it kills me.
translation.es: Tengo que matar a esta máquina antes de que me mate a mí.

translation.en: Really, I have to finish this dress.
Two of my agents are following us right now.
translation.es: Dos de mis agentes nos están siguiendo.

translation.en: They've been following us for a while.
I want you to spot them before we get to that juice bar.
translation.es: Detéctalos antes de que lleguemos a ese bar.

translation.en: Don't let them see you know,
that way you have an advantage.

translation.es: Avanza en zigzag, en direcciones diferentes.

translation.en: and check the reflections whenever you can.
translation.es: y mira todos los reflejos que puedas.

translation.en: Combines a high- velocity cannon with exceptional long- range endurance.
translation.es: Un cañón de alta velocidad con resistencia de largo alcance.

translation.en: This model has an entirely new, thinner,
translation.es: Tiene un ala de flecha y un estabilizador

translation.en: and more highly swept wing and tail plane for speeds approaching Mach 1.
translation.es: totalmente nuevos y más delgados para velocidades cercanas a Mach One.

translation.en: Our goal is 25 words a minute.

translation.es: - Catorce palabras. Tres errores. - De nuevo.

translation.en: Co-- I-- I mean, Colonel Afif Al- Bizri.
translation.es: Digo, el coronel Afif al Bizri.

translation.en: The man in the brown shirt and short sleeves.
translation.es: El de camisa marrón de mangas cortas.
Cuarenta y cinco palabras. Cero errores.

translation.en: Ahmed Suidani, head of secret police.
translation.es: Ahmed Suidani, jefe de la policía secreta.
Proyectiles de mortero de 125 mm. Más.

translation.en: The man with the green cap,
and the older woman by the vegetable stand.
translation.es: y la mujer mayor junto al puesto de verduras.

translation.en: There's no room for mistake, Eli.
He spotted the both of you.
I'm looking for my husband, Eli Cohen.
translation.es: Busco a mi marido, Eli Cohen.

translation.en: He needs to head up from the north.
- From the south or the north? - I couldn't spot it.
translation.es: - ¿Del sur o del norte? - No lo vi.

translation.en: Everything is moving according to plan.
We need to move him faster into Buenos Aires.
translation.es: Hay que llevarlo pronto a Buenos Aires.

translation.en: - It's the perfect time to get in. - I can't agree to that.
translation.es: - Es el momento perfecto. - No me parece.

translation.en: Last I checked, you work for me.
translation.es: Creí que yo era tu jefe.

translation.en: His cover is not yet secured.
Cover is never perfect. People are dying while we wait.
translation.es: Nunca es perfecta. Y hay más y más muertos.

translation.en: He's of no use in Damascus if he's not secure.
translation.es: No servirá en Damasco si no es seguro.

translation.en: - Think of the risk of sending him. - The Prime Minister spent his morning
translation.es: El riesgo de enviarlo... El primer ministro pasó la mañana con una madre que perdió a dos hijos.

translation.en: consoling a mother who lost two of her children.
translation.es: El primer ministro pasó la mañana con una madre que perdió a dos hijos.

translation.en: A nine year- old girl who lost both her parents and both her legs.
translation.es: Con una niña de nueve años que perdió las piernas y a sus padres.

translation.en: A Swedish volunteer who lost her eyesight
translation.es: Con una voluntaria sueca que perdió la vista

translation.en: because she came to this country to help pick tomatoes.
translation.es: porque vino al país a ayudar a cosechar tomates.

translation.en: Are you working on your cover?
- I thought you were done for the day? - I am.
They seem to have a revolution every two months.
translation.es: Parecen tener una revolución cada dos meses.

translation.en: We like to joke that the leader is the first Syrian officer
translation.es: El chiste es que los lidera el primer oficial

translation.en: to get to the radio in the morning, tell the people he's president.
translation.es: que llega a la radio a la mañana y anuncia que es presidente.

translation.en: Tomorrow I'm scheduled to hand in your report to Jacob.
translation.es: Mañana debo presentarle tu informe a Jacob.

translation.en: It says you passed all the exams, and that you're ready to be operational.
translation.es: Que aprobaste todos los exámenes y que estás listo para operar.

translation.en: Thank you. Don't thank me yet.
You have 24 hours to think about it.
And I want you to really take your time
translation.es: Y quiero que te tomes tu tiempo

translation.en: If you come back and say yes, I'll hand in the report
translation.es: Si me dices que sí, presentaré el informe

translation.en: But if you say you've decided you don't want to pursue this,
translation.es: Pero si decides no seguir adelante,

translation.en: Say that you've been found an unlikely candidate.
translation.es: Diré que no te consideramos idóneo.

translation.en: You want me to say no?
This is your life we're talking about.
I want you to know you're not obligated to do this.
translation.es: Quiero que sepas que no estás obligado a hacer esto.

translation.en: It's a bit late for that.
Your mother told me once that when a man brings his wife flowers,
translation.es: Tu madre me dijo una vez que si tu marido te da flores,

translation.en: That sounds exactly like my mother.
- Who are you cheating on me with? - What...
I went to the store today to visit you.
translation.es: Hoy fui a la tienda a visitarte.

translation.en: They told me you haven't worked there for months.
told you before. I just wanted to make sure that they offered me the job
translation.es: ...dicho antes, pero quería que me ofrecieran el empleo

translation.en: To be... What is it again?
I will be a buyer for the Ministry of Defence.
translation.es: Seré comprador del Ministerio de Defensa.

translation.en: I'll be traveling all around the world...
Eli, if this is about money, I can get another job.
translation.es: Eli, si es por dinero, puedo conseguir otro trabajo.

translation.en: No, I will not have my wife work two jobs.
translation.es: No, no dejaré que mi esposa tenga dos trabajos.

translation.en: for me to give you the life that I promised you, Nadi.
translation.es: para darte la vida que te prometí, Nadi.

translation.en: Will you be gone for a long period of time?
If I prove myself over the next few years,
translation.es: Si demuestro que valgo en estos años,

translation.en: who knows, they might even make me an ambassador,
and that means that you will be Mrs. Ambassador Cohen.
translation.es: ¡Y tú serías la señora del embajador Cohen!

translation.en: So why did you go to visit my old work?
translation.es: ¿Por qué fuiste a mi vieja oficina?

translation.en: I just happened to be nearby.
It's stupid. My wife and I, we...
translation.es: Es una tontería. Mi esposa y yo...

translation.en: We write each other letters and we leave them in silly places.
translation.es: ...nos escribimos cartas y nos las escondemos.

translation.en: Read it and give it to me.
Eli, I love you more than anything in the whole wide world,
translation.es: Eli, te amo más que nada en todo el mundo,

translation.en: She said she loves my mustache.
He's arrived. He's getting debriefed as we speak.
So I guess Mrs. Burek is uninterested in my bribes?
translation.es: Veo que a la señora Burek no le interesan mis sobornos.

translation.en: What happened to him was not your fault.
translation.es: Lo que le pasó a él no fue tu culpa.

translation.en: He knew the risks. We lost an agent.
translation.es: Conocía el riesgo. Perdimos a un agente.

translation.en: You know, the first time I saw Mrs. Burek
translation.es: La primera vez que vi a la señora Burek

translation.en: was when I delivered the bad news.
translation.es: fue cuando le di la mala noticia.

translation.en: I didn't know what she looked like.
It was easier that way. Clean, efficient.
translation.es: Así era más fácil. Limpio, eficiente.

translation.en: It's way above my pay grade,
and maybe I shouldn't even ask this question, but...
translation.es: y quizá ni debería preguntarlo, pero...

translation.en: aren't we risking him being exposed to more people than he should be?
translation.es: ...¿no nos arriesgamos a exponerlo ante demasiada gente?

translation.en: Argentina is the most important Arab expat center.
translation.es: Argentina es el mayor centro de expatriados árabes.

translation.en: It's the ideal place for Eli to create relationships within the Arab community
translation.es: Es el lugar ideal para que Eli cree relaciones en la comunidad árabe

translation.en: My name is Kamel Amin Thaabeth.
translation.es: Mi nombre es Kamel Amin Thaabeth.

translation.en: I was named after my father,
translation.es: Me llamo así por mi padre,

translation.en: My mother's name is Sa'ida Abrahim.
translation.es: AEROPUERTO DE EZEIZA BUENOS AIRES Mi madre se llama Sa'id Abrahim.

translation.en: They were both born in Damascus,
but moved to Beirut looking for work.
translation.es: pero se mudaron a Beirut en busca de trabajo.

translation.en: That is where I was born...
my parents moved to Buenos Aires...
translation.es: mis padres se mudaron a Buenos Aires,

translation.en: where my father owned a very big textile factory
translation.es: donde mi padre tenía una gran fábrica textil

translation.en: That is where I live now.
...I took over the business, and, I'm proud to say,
translation.es: me hice cargo de la empresa. Y es un orgullo decir

translation.en: it became one of the most prominent textile companies in South America.
translation.es: que se convirtió en una de las textiles más importantes de Sudamérica.

translation.en: I do not have any brothers or sisters.
I had an older sister, but...
she passed away when I was three years old.
translation.es: pero murió cuando yo tenía tres años.

translation.en: I've never been to Damascus myself.
I fell in love with it through the stories my father told me.
translation.es: ...me enamoré de ella con las anécdotas de mi papá.

translation.en: I am the biggest patriot of my beloved country.
translation.es: Soy el mayor patriota de mi amado país.

translation.en: I feel it is now time...
to contribute in whatever way I can.
translation.es: para ayudar en lo que pueda.

translation.en: I believe that I can make a difference.
translation.es: Creo que puedo marcar la diferencia.

translation.en: We don't have much time. Please.
translation.es: No hay mucho tiempo, por favor.
